p: Mulberry ( Moursalba L) belongs to Family Moreaceac which used to treat fever and headache, Mulberry can help treat chronic diseases of digestive tract and improve appetite. It is also used in treating chronic gastritis and hepatitis. It is helpful in Cough, dyspepsia, oedema and oligurea ( Sunil and Ammani, 2009). Recent studies have shown M. alba has antioxidant, antibacterial, antiviral and anti-inflammatory properties ( El-Beshbishy et al., 2006).
